load_sensing.label: Load Sensing
load_sensing.description: Sense if the load is on or off

options.label: LED on when switch is OFF
LED on when switch is ON
LED on when switch is OFF
LED on when switch is ON

switch_mode.label: Switch Mode
switch_mode.description: Turn your dimmer into an On/Off switch with switch mode

alternate_exclusion.label: Alternate Exclusion
alternate_exclusion.description: Enables alternate method for excluding the device to prevent accidental removal

options.label: Press any button on the switch
Press two times ON button and two time OFF button, LED will flash 5 times if successful

alternate_exclusion_h.label: Alternate Exclusion
alternate_exclusion_h.description: When enabled, press 3 times and hold on the last press to remove the device during exclusion

dimmer_steps.label: Dimmer Steps
dimmer_steps.description: Number of dimming steps or levels

dimmer_times.label: Dimmer Step Time
dimmer_times.description: Timing of dimming steps or levels

dimmer_steps_z.label: Dimmer Steps (Remote Command)
dimmer_steps_z.description: Number of dimming steps or levels when sent from a zwave command

dimmer_times_z.label: Dimmer Step Time (Remote Command)
dimmer_times_z.description: Timing of dimming steps or levels when sent from a zwave command

dimmer_steps_a.label: Dimmer Steps (Group Command)
dimmer_steps_a.description: Number of dimming steps or levels when sent from a group command

dimmer_times_a.label: Dimmer Step Time (Group Command)
dimmer_times_a.description: Timing of dimming steps or levels when sent from a group command

dim_threshold_min.label: Minimum Dim Threshold
dim_threshold_min.description: Set the minimum dimmer threshold when manually or remotely controlled

dim_threshold_max.label: Maximum Brightness Threshold
dim_threshold_max.description: Set the maximum brightness threshold when manually or remotely controlled

default_brightness_level.label: Default Brightness Level
default_brightness_level.description: Set the default brightness level that the dimmer will turn on when being controlled manually

dim_rate.label: Dim up/down rate
dim_rate.description: Adjust the speed at which the ramps to a specific value other than 0 and FF
